lender.name: Diane and Ken

lender.name: Davlin Consulting
lender.loan_because: Lending to somebody sends the message that you're treating him or her as an equal; someone who can participate with you in a business relationship. It's a really dignified way to interact with people. We know that we're helping them build a sustainable business that will provide income to feed, clothe, house and educate their family long after my loan is paid back. Help us in changing the world – one loan at a time!
lender.occupational_info: Davlin Consulting is a boutique design and marketing firm with a sassy personal touch and fun and well-served clientèle. We focus on philanthropy and sustainable designs. At Davlin Consulting, we are fully aware of the current state of our planet and its ecosystems. We strive to make our carbon footprint, thus yours, as small as possible.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: It's a chance to help someone who may not have other choices.

lender.occupational_info: I live in студенченском a hostel, I know what to wash the whole problem to establish washing machines in rooms the head does not resolve a hostel, and manually to wash a blanket cover, a bed-sheet and a pillowcase it is possible not all. I have organised point of gathering of dirty linen in a hostel. In the end of each working day I make dirty linen gathering (blouses, trousers etc.) and I erase them on one washing machine. At additional expense I suggest students to take away not simply washed things, but also ironing. Cost of services depends on weight, and from a linen kind, considering that lives in each hostel about several hundreds students, the release from clients is not present. Except that that an expense for the business organisation min - 3 washing machines, 2 ironing tables are necessary only. For this purpose us does not suffice 600$ U.S.A

lender.loan_because: I realize that I have everything I want in life, and that many people don't have anything. Mahatma Ghandi said that poverty is the world's worst form of violence. And I believe that is true. So I look for opportunities to give something back to the world, sometimes small, sometimes big ... Just discovered Kiva, and hope that what I donate will be brought to good use. If so, then I hope to be active in many ways.

lender.name: Annie
lender.loan_because: Microfinance in general is a reasonable way to provide financial services to the poor. I loan because I want to support women´s empowerment. Women are the poorest of the poor. Women in particular benefit from access to credit because from experience the ability to generate income from an own business improves their livelihoods AND that of their children. Furthermore economic activities, responsibility for a credit and financial independency improve the social status of women because financial resources in the hand of women have an impact on power relations and participation.

lender.occupational_info: L’activité se veut unique en son genre depuis les plantations de cereales à leur sortie vers les dépôts de vente. Le projet envisage de se référer aux normes de production agricole en partenariat avec des réseaux de vente de

lender.name: Marya
lender.loan_because: I have not loaned before but I would be willing to participate in a loaning network because I believe that there are many people of good will in the world who have great vision to help their fellow citizens but lack the resources. No man is an island and God commands us to love one another.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Founder/Director of a community based organization in a small flood-prone village in western Kenya. We are running a school for orphans and poor children from the community and I need to raise money to buy books, uniforms, food and to build classrooms. We have set up a community OVC care and support program for elderly caregivers and vulnerable families and we require funds to set up income generating activities to enable these people to be economically stable and self reliant. The poverty levels in this region are extremely high and the number of orphans continues to rise.

It took several years of very hard work and financial struggle to become well established and a well respected business in my community. Every helping hand is so much appreciated and I would like to help others become established and give back to their own communities.
lender.occupational_info: Helping underprivileged and underserved people through the legal process with respect and compassion when they cannot afford an attorney or otherwise obtain legal assistance. Se habla Espanol

lender.name: ulrike
lender.occupation: there`s no special word for my job
lender.loan_because: ...it makes me happy to make s.o.else happy.....and i`m glad to earn enough money for my own living
lender.occupational_info: i do the planning for new kindergardens and schools in a small town in germany. i`m responsible for everything which has to do with the need of children in a town.

lender.name: Dirk
lender.loan_because: I think itś a big honour to rent money to somebody who wants to increase his or her business under sometimes very miserable life conditions.

lender.name: Sidique
lender.loan_because: I want to give people an opportunity to have a happy life.
lender.occupational_info: I love life!

lender.name: FocusApps
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to grow up a business!
lender.occupational_info: We are developing applications for iPhone and iPod.

lender.name: Maxine
lender.loan_because: This is better than giving charity, and even if you aren't wealthy you can contribute.

lender.name: Samuel
lender.loan_because: I want the limited capital I possess to be used as fully as possible.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: Good fortune brings true joy when shared!

lender.name: kate
lender.loan_because: I have a bit of money to loan and people have fantastic business ideas that need financing
lender.occupational_info: I teach a foreign language (spanish) to students who will use it in practical ways

lender.name: Enzo
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of helping someone less fortunate than myself. Kiva is a wonderful and practical concept. Way to go Kiva team.
lender.occupational_info: I sell glass machinery.

lender.name: in memory of Brigitte Ho
lender.loan_because: We wanted to continue the help Brigitte Ho gave. In june 2009 Brigitte Ho died. She helped those who were in need, so we asked for donations for KIVA instead of flowers.

lender.name: Leila
lender.loan_because: I love to help people!
lender.occupational_info: I am retired but like to assist my son with his charity Help In Asia.

lender.name: Michael Z
lender.loan_because: It's a wonderful thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I sell medical products to folks who need them.

lender.name: Marko
lender.loan_because: I read about KIVA in an interview with Dambisa Moyo. I think she is right. http://www.nytimes.com/2009/02/22/magazine/22wwln-q4-t.html?_r=2&ref=magazine
lender.occupational_info: Selling high-tech electromagnetic field simulation software for CST AG, Germany

lender.name: Markus
lender.occupation: Developer of simulation games for sustainability
lender.loan_because: I loan because $25 for an entrepreneur of Kiva generate much more "wellbeing" than $25 spent for another T-shirt, a new CD or five cups of coffee. I loan because my own grand parents together with their sons and daugthers have overcome poverty, which was a long, hard and finally successful journey.
lender.occupational_info: I create and run simulation games for adults and school children that let them experience. sustainable development. Some of them deal with climate and energy, others help unemployed people to learn more about their own capabilities, others deal with many more aspects of sustainability.

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: I am excited about the power of a little help.
lender.occupational_info: I'm committed to making one of the most difficult times in a person's life the very best it can be.

lender.name: Irene
lender.loan_because: it gives those in need more self assurance than a mere donation.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: I want to help people get what they need to operate more efficiently and get better results from their businesses or otherwise improve their financial situation. My own experience with using and paying back loans (including law school loans, which I am still paying back) is that, when used wisely, credit can allow you to buy things that allow you to pay back the loan and improve your economic situation in ways that would be impossible without the loan.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: I think Kiva gives people the chance to fulfill their dream.
lender.occupational_info: Currently, I am studying Business.

lender.name: Cat
lender.loan_because: I want to encourage other people, especially women of all ages, to believe in their dreams and help them in some small way to make those dreams come true.
lender.occupational_info: I am lucky enough to be able to make a living creating recycled steel and sustainable cork jewelry.

lender.name: Marco
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of microfinancing.

lender.name: Katja
lender.loan_because: It think this idea with microfinances that can help poor people improve their lives with small means is a great idea that I am happy to support.

lender.name: moraima
lender.occupation: teacher aid/. business administration human resour

lender.name: Hege
lender.loan_because: I am able to, and because I believe providing for micro loans is a good alternative in poverty alleviation.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed in my life and wish the same for others.
lender.occupational_info: I work with medical records in a hospital.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I heard a news story on the impact of mircoloans and thought it was a great idea.
lender.occupational_info: I coordinate the use and managment of water resources for the public good.

lender.name: Coops
lender.loan_because: we all need a hand up sometimes.
